prompt: Create an enchanting full-art image of an Ethereal Lantern in the Mystic Swamp. The lantern hangs from an ancient gnarled tree branch, glowing with a soft, mystical light that pierces through the thick mist around it. The lantern itself is intricately designed, with an elaborate mix of vines, gems, and runes. Surrounding the lantern, the swamp is dark and brimming with glowing plants and eerie magical symbols etched into the tree bark. The atmosphere is both mysterious and serene, capturing the essence of the enchanted artifact in this mystical setting.
